title: Ace mountaineer removed as ambassador of 'Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao' after she joins Cong
selftext: Parmar is the first woman from MP to conquer four highest peaks, including the Mount Everest (which she scaled on May 22, 2019) in as many continents, according to mountaineers.
comments: Apni Beti bachao, dusre ki bhagao!
